# All Terrain Vehicles, Utility Terrain Vehicles and Trailer Rentals

## Solicitation Reference

* Reference: WS3620710822-Doc3620710872
* Amendment Number: 3
* Publication Date: August 29, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: September 22, 2022, at 14:00 EDT
* Amendment Date: September 12, 2022

## Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting bids for the provision of All Terrain Vehicles (ATVs), Utility Terrain Vehicles (UTVs), and trailers to support the Department of National Defence's (DND) fleet. This procurement is a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the rental of the mentioned equipment for discretionary use.

## Description

The contract will be awarded through a competitive, open bidding process, with the bid criterion being the lowest price. The procurement is subject to the terms and conditions outlined in the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other applicable trade agreements, including the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and others listed in the trade agreements section below.

## Geographical Regions

Deliveries will be made in the following regions:

* Cold Lake
* Wainwright
* Edmonton

## Trade Agreements

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

## Procurement Process

The procurement process will be conducted in accordance with the applicable trade agreements, and the Lowest Bid Procedure will be used to evaluate bids. A Standalone Request for Standing Offer has been issued, and a notice has been published on the Buyandsell website. Bidders are required to submit their responses electronically to the Ariba Discovery System.

## Contact Information

For more information or clarification regarding this solicitation, contact:
